channel.title: Error whenever I click a spell, a button or anything (except items or tabs)
channel.description:
[code][James]: Logged in [James]: command: pickup 6317 1 Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from James. java.lang.NullPointerException at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:5) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16411) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17695) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [James]: Disconnected [James]: Logged in[/code]
Yeah, all help is appreciated.

item.title: Error whenever I click a spell, a button or anything (except items or tabs)
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

CoonHunter:

You server is not coded correctly, and there is an error in there. This happened to me when i attempted to do a small fix to my cannons, when you would fire it, it would lag anybody nearby.

I still wish you would release the cannon coding. (Or at least to me :P)
@Topic: I would restore your backup and retry doing any changes. If it persists, can’t help ya. :\

Read full topic
item.source: Error whenever I click a spell, a button or anything (except items or tabs)
